name: Red & the Dog Days of Summer
name_original: Red & the Dog Days of Summer
description:
Red & the Dog Days of Summer is an atypical role-playing game featuring a coming of age narrative and multiple endings. Set in the small town of Arbourville, the protagonist Red is enlisted by the self-declared superhero Captain Blue to find the culprit behind a series of dognappings. The player must guide Red to gather clues and draw the right conclusions in order to bring justice to Arbourville. Depending on the player's decisions, Red may also make friends or enemies of the townsfolk. The elements of the game comes together to weave a tale about isolation, self-realization, and acceptance.

If you find any bugs, please feel free to report them in the comments.
